title: Estimation of Obesity Levels
description: Built ML models (KNN, SVM, DNN) to predict obesity levels from lifestyle and health data, achieving up to 97% accuracy.

title: KFUPM Student Impact Hub
description: Designed requirements, use cases, and Figma prototypes for a student hub, ensuring traceability and usability.

title: Soccer@KFUPM
description: Developed a full-stack tournament management system with PostgreSQL, Flask, and front-end tools to manage teams, matches, and stats.

title: Identifying At-Risk Students
description: Applied Decision Tree, Naive Bayes, and Random Forest to predict at-risk students using survey and academic data.

title: Multi-Index Student Records
description: Implemented B-Trees, Hash Tables, and Multi-Way Trees in Java for efficient indexing and management of student records.

title: Student Club Management Platform
description: Prototyped a platform for managing clubs, events, and memberships with role-based dashboards and UI/UX design.

title: Event Booking System in Java
description: Built an event booking system with JavaFX, supporting admin/user roles, event management, and interactive GUI.

title: Library Management System
description: Developed a Python/C system to manage books, borrowers, and transactions with search, add, update, and delete features.
